member.name: T:CallrApi.Helper.Converter`1
member.summary: This class allows you to convert an object in its internal type.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Helper.Converter`1.ToObject(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.String)
member.summary: This method returns the key associted value in the dictionary.
member.returns: An object of type T corresponding to the key associted value, otherwise the T type default value.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Helper.Converter`1.ToObject(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: This method casts object value in the expected type.
member.param: Property name (used in case of error).
member.returns: An oject of type T corresponding to the casted object.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Helper.Converter`1.ToObjectList(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.String)
member.summary: This method returns the key associted value list in the dictionary.
member.returns: An object list of type T corresponding to the key associted value, otherwise the T type default value.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Helper.Converter`1.ToObjectList(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: This method returns an object value list casted in the expected type.
member.param: Property name (used in case of error).
member.returns: An oject list of type T corresponding to the casted object.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Helper.Converter`1.ToDictionaryList(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.String)
member.summary: This method returns the key associted value dictionary in the dictionary.
member.returns: A dictionary of key/value pairs of type string/List of T corresponding to the key associted value, otherwise the Dictionary with key / value pairs string / List of T type default value.

member.name: T:CallrApi.Helper.Creator`1
member.summary: This class allows you to create an object in its internal type.
member.typeparam: The expected conversion type. It must inherit from BaseClass.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Helper.Creator`1.Object(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.String)
member.summary: This method returns the key associted value in the dictionary.
member.returns: An object of type T corresponding to the key associted value, otherwise the T type default value.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Helper.Creator`1.Object(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: This method creates the value object in the expected type.
member.param: Property name (used in case of error).
member.returns: An oject of type T corresponding to the created object.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Helper.Creator`1.ObjectList(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.String)
member.summary: This method returns the key associted value list in the dictionary.
member.returns: An object list of type T corresponding to the key associted value, otherwise the T type default value.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Helper.Creator`1.ObjectList(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: This method returns an object value list casted in the expected type.
member.param: Property name (used in case of error).
member.returns: An oject list of type T corresponding to the casted object.

member.name: T:CallrApi.Helper.BaseClassJavaScriptConverter
member.summary:
This class is a converter for BaseClass objects.
A conversion is made : - to change DateTime output during serialization - to change BaseClass obect property names in the JSON serialized object

member.name: P:CallrApi.Helper.BaseClassJavaScriptConverter.SupportedTypes
member.summary: Property that defines converter class supported types. In our case, we only support BaseClass class.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Helper.BaseClassJavaScriptConverter.Deserialize(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.Type,System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer)
member.summary: This method converts the provided dictionary into an object of the specified type.
member.param: An instance of property data stored as name/value pairs.
The type of the resulting object.
member.returns: The deserialized object.
member.remarks: We do not need to implement this method for our converter.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Helper.BaseClassJavaScriptConverter.Serialize(System.Object,System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer)
member.summary: This method builds a dictionary of name/value pairs.
member.param: The object that is responsible for the serialization.
member.returns: An object that contains key/value pairs that represent the object’s data.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Helper.BaseClassJavaScriptConverter.GetJsonPropertyName(System.String)
member.summary: This method transfors PascalCase string to "pascal_case" string.
member.returns: The string in "pascal_case" format.

member.name: T:CallrApi.Helper.DictionaryCreator`2
member.summary: This class allows you to create a dictonary of objects in their internal types.
member.typeparam: The dictionary key type (must be string or int).

member.name: M:CallrApi.Helper.DictionaryCreator`2.Object(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: This method returns an object value dictionary casted in the expected type.
member.param: Property name (used in case of error).
member.returns: A dictionary of key/value pairs of type K/T corresponding to the key associted value, otherwise the Dictionary with key / value pairs K / T type default value.

member.name: F:CallrApi.Helper.Tools.DATETIME_FORMAT
member.summary: Date and Time format used by the API.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Helper.Tools.ObjectDump(System.Object,System.Int32)
member.summary: This method lets you display an object content.
member.returns: A string containing the object dump.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Helper.Tools.UtcDateString(System.DateTime)
member.summary: This method returns the date in UTC and API waiting format string.
member.returns: The date in UTC and API waiting format string.

member.name: P:CallrApi.Objects.RealTime.RealTimeCallOptions.cli
member.summary: Calling Line Identification. Can be "BLOCKED", any DID you have on your account, or any phone number we have authorized on your account. Format: cli_phone_number (International E.164 format "+CCNSN". Example: "+33123456789" or "BLOCKED")

member.name: T:CallrApi.Objects.RealTime.RealTime
member.summary: This class represents Realtime App. Allows you to control the call in realtime.

member.name: P:CallrApi.Objects.RealTime.RealTime.DataFormat
member.summary: Data format. The only format supported right now is "JSON" (possible values are defined in class).

member.name: P:CallrApi.Objects.RealTime.RealTime.Login
member.summary: Login if your URL is password protected (HTTP Basic Authentication).

member.name: P:CallrApi.Objects.RealTime.RealTime.Password
member.summary: Password If your URL is password protected (HTTP Basic Authentication).

member.name: P:CallrApi.Objects.RealTime.RealTime.Url
member.summary: Your URL callback. Our system will POST call status to your URL, and your answers will control the call.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Objects.RealTime.RealTime.InitFromDictionary(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: This method initializes object properties from the parameter dictionary.

member.name: T:CallrApi.Objects.RealTime.Request
member.summary: This class represents a Real-Time Request (Our POST to your server).

member.name: P:CallrApi.Objects.RealTime.Request.command
member.summary: The command name related to this request.

member.name: P:CallrApi.Objects.RealTime.Request.command_id
member.summary: The command id related to this request.

member.name: P:CallrApi.Objects.RealTime.Request.command_result
member.summary: The command result related to this request.

member.name: P:CallrApi.Objects.RealTime.Request.command_error
member.summary: The command error (if any) related to this request.

member.name: P:CallrApi.Objects.RealTime.Request.call_status
member.summary: Call status (possible values are defined in class).

member.name: P:CallrApi.Objects.RealTime.Request.variables
member.summary: Key/Value object sent back with each request. You can use this as a session object.

member.name: T:CallrApi.Objects.RealTime.RealTimeResponse
member.summary: This class represents a Real-Time Response (Your response to our requests).

member.name: P:CallrApi.Objects.RealTime.RealTimeResponse.CommandId
member.summary: Command ID. Use the value you want. We will send this ID back when we have the result ready. Useful to keep track of your scenario.

member.name: P:CallrApi.Objects.RealTime.RealTimeResponse.Command
member.summary: The command we have to execute (see the commands list in Real-Time).

member.name: P:CallrApi.Objects.RealTime.RealTimeResponse.Params
member.summary: Command parameters. See the Real-Time commands.

member.name: P:CallrApi.Objects.RealTime.RealTimeResponse.Variables
member.summary: Key/Value object. You can fill this object with anything, we will send it back without touching it in our next request. You can use this as a session object.

member.name: P:CallrApi.Objects.App.Param.Vms.Active
member.summary: If not activated, the call is hang up.

member.name: P:CallrApi.Objects.App.Param.Vms.FileFormat
member.summary: File attachment format (possible values are defined in class).

member.name: P:CallrApi.Objects.App.Param.Vms.Record
member.summary: If false, the call is hang up after playing the prompt.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Objects.App.Param.Vms.InitFromDictionary(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: This method initializes object properties from the parameter dictionary.

member.name: T:CallrApi.Objects.App.Param.VmsDetect
member.summary: This class represents Outbound Voicemail Detection.

member.name: P:CallrApi.Objects.App.Param.VmsDetect.DtmfIterations
member.summary: When using the DTMF method, how many times do we try to have a DTMF ? (default: 2).

member.name: P:CallrApi.Objects.App.Param.VmsDetect.DtmfMedia
member.summary: When using the DTMF method, Media played before detection (default: 0).

member.name: P:CallrApi.Objects.App.Param.VmsDetect.DtmfTimeout
member.summary: When using the DTMF method, how long do we wait for a DTMF to be sent ? (default: 2).

member.name: P:CallrApi.Objects.App.Param.VmsDetect.Method
member.summary: Detection method (possible values are defined in class).

member.name: P:CallrApi.Objects.App.Param.VmsDetect.SilenceIterations
member.summary: When using the SILENCE method, how many times do we try ? (default: 1, min: 1, max: 30).

member.name: P:CallrApi.Objects.App.Param.VmsDetect.SilenceMedia
member.summary: When using the SILENCE method, Media played before detection (default: 0).

member.name: P:CallrApi.Objects.App.Param.VmsDetect.SilenceMs
member.summary: When using the SILENCE method, how long must be the silence in milliseconds ? (default: 1800, min: 50, max: 10000).

member.name: P:CallrApi.Objects.App.Param.VmsDetect.SilenceTimeout
member.summary: When using the SILENCE method, how long do we try to detect silence ? (default: 3, min: 0, max: 120).

member.name: M:CallrApi.Objects.App.Param.VmsDetect.InitFromDictionary(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: This method initializes object properties from the parameter dictionary.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Services.Client.MediaService.NestedLibrary.GetPhoneId(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: This method retrieves a DTMF sequence "phone_id" in order to record a MediaLibrary by phone.
member.param: The Media ID your want to record by phone.
The country code you are in (we will give you a local phone number to call).
member.returns: object representing the Phone ID (DTMF sequence + phone number).

member.name: M:CallrApi.Services.Client.MediaService.NestedLibrary.SetContent(System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method sets the MediaLibrary content with your own file.
member.param: Text prompt (What is your Media saying?).
base64 encoded audio data file. Currently the file MUST BE "WAV" PCM encoded. 16 bit 48Khz mono is RECOMMENDED.
member.returns: Always true, throws an Exception otherwise.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Services.Client.MediaService.NestedLibrary.SetContentFromRecording(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: This method sets MediaLibrary content from a recording previously created using Realtime command record.
member.returns: Always true, throws an Exception otherwise.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Services.Client.MediaService.NestedLibrary.SetName(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: This method changes a MediaLibrary name.
member.returns: Always true, throws an Exception otherwise.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Services.Client.MediaService.NestedLibrary.SetTags(System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String}})
member.summary: This method sets Tags on a MediaLibrary. You can set as many tags as you want.
member.param: The unique media id to edit.

The tags to apply. It will completely replace previously set tags.
Special tag names : * CATEGORY : if specified, values must be one of class. * LANGUAGE : if specified, values must be in the form “en_US”, “en_GB”, “fr_FR”, etc.
member.returns: Always true, throws an Exception otherwise.

member.name: T:CallrApi.Services.Server.RealTimeService
member.summary: This class allows you to control phone calls in real-time.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Services.Server.RealTimeService.Dialout(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{CallrApi.Objects.Misc.Target},System.String)
member.summary: This method makes another call, and bridges the call on answer.
member.param: Plays music or classic ringtone (possible values are defined in class).
Phone numbers called sequentially until one answers.
member.returns: object representing the real-time response.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Services.Server.RealTimeService.Hangup
member.summary: This method hangs up the call.
member.returns: object representing the real-time response.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Services.Server.RealTimeService.Play(System.String)
member.summary: This method plays a Media.Library or say something with the Text-to-Speech.
member.param: Media ID or Text to say.
member.returns: object representing the real-time response.

members.member:
This method plays a recording recorded with the command.
Temporary file name. object representing the real-time response.
/>

member.name: M:CallrApi.Services.Server.RealTimeService.Read(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: This method plays a Media and wait for a DTMF input at the same time.
member.param: Input timeout in milliseconds. min:100 max:30000.
member.returns: object representing the real-time response.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Services.Server.RealTimeService.Record(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This method records the user. The recording can be stopped by pressing the hash key '#', when silence is detected, or when maximum recording duration is reached.
member.param: (seconds) Stop recording on silence. Min:0 (disabled), Max:20.
member.returns: object representing the real-time response.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Services.Server.RealTimeService.SendDtmf(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.param: (milliseconds) Duration of each digit. Min: 1, Max: 5000.
(milliseconds) Amount of time between tones. Min: 0, Max: 10000.
member.returns: object representing the real-time response.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Services.Server.RealTimeService.Wait(System.Int32)
member.summary: This method waits for a few seconds.
member.returns: object representing the real-time response.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Services.Server.RealTimeService.WaitForSilence(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This method waits until silence is detected, or timeout is reached.
member.param: Number of times to try. Min:1, Max:10.
(seconds) Global timeout if silence is not detected. Min:0 (disabled), Max:300.
member.returns: object representing the real-time response.

member.summary: This metho requests the specified API method with its parameter.

member.name: T:CallrApi.Json.JsonRequest
member.summary: This class represents data sent to API server during a JSON-RPC request.

member.name: P:CallrApi.Json.JsonRequest.id
member.summary: Request ID. The server will respond with the same ID in order to identify it.
member.remarks: Object type can be int, string or null.

member.name: P:CallrApi.Json.JsonRequest.method
member.summary: Method to process on the server.

member.name: P:CallrApi.Json.JsonRequest.parameters
member.summary: Structured object acting as the method parameter.

member.name: M:CallrApi.Json.JsonRequest.GetJson
member.summary: Build the request in JSON-RPC format.
member.returns: The request in JSON-RPC format.

member.name: T:CallrApi.Json.JsonResponse
member.summary: This class represents data contained in a JSON-RPC response.

member.name: P:CallrApi.Json.JsonResponse.result
member.remarks: Set only in case of success call.

member.name: P:CallrApi.Json.JsonResponse.error
member.remarks: Set only in case of error.
